body.p: Alton, Illinois, military prison. Operated from 1862 to 1865. U.S. military prison for Confederate prisoners. Commandant(s): Major T. Hendrickson, Colonel G. W. Kincaid, Colonel William Weer, and Brigadier General Joseph T. Copeland.
